package.name: NotiFill Pro
package.shortDescription: Visualization of the moment before the disappearance of the notification window from the screen (with dynamic color rendition)

descriptionlist.description:
The notification window fills with a dynamically calculated color, measuring the seconds until the notification disappears from the screen. It is possible to adjust the delay of the start of the animation. It is possible to assign a custom color for the notification window.
Attention! NotiFill Pro has not been tested with other notification center tweaks.
